cause.description:
replace everyone from the top down startin from government and the police there all crooked cops kill rape and beat any one and get away with it like that phillipino guy had a knife the cop shot him 3 times and killed him he said self defence my ass if i did that or any one i know or some one with a past it would of been 1st degree murder and for politicins way pay taxes for what not everyone in the country gets free med and dentle or education thats needs to be fixed and our energy thing is bull shit there are alternative vehicles that would stop the green house gases stop production on all the car and truck intustries and make the switch thee engines its so simple but they wont do it ITS ALL BULL SHIT AND NEEDS TO CHANGE IT AINT NO JOKE
1. GREEN HOUSE EMISSIONS FROM VEHICLES
2. CROOKED COPS , KILLER COPS , RAPEST COPS
3. FREE MEDICLE , DENTILE , EDUCATION FREE FREE
cause.name: FUCK THE GOVERNMENT
